ncrsdatagroup.abcd:ProjectTitle: Collecting trip to the Azores in 1979

ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: AZO.37a: Azores, Flores, SE coast, Porto das Lajes; 39°23'N 31°10'W; exposed rocky barrier with deep tide-pools, algae, boulders and coarse sand; snorkeling; 19/25.ix.1979
CANCAP-IV, Sta. 4.080: Canary Islands, SE of Lanzarote; 28°55'N 13°33'W; depth 200-220 m, shell gravel, sand; Hamon grab and van Veen grab; 21.v.1980

CANCAP-IV, Sta. 4.020: Canary Islands, S of Lanzarote; 28°49'N 13°48'W; depth 31-34 m, shellgravel; van Veen grab; 15.v.1980
CANCAP-V, Sta. 5.D11: Azores, N coast of Flores, near Ponta Delgada; 39°31'N 31°12'W; entrance of small bay, depth to 15 m; scuba diving; 12.vi.1981
CANCAP-IV, Sta. 4.K06: Canary Islands, E coast of Gran Canaria, Arinaga; 27°51'N 15°24'W; rocks, tide pools, sandy bay, seagrass, depth 0-5 m; ; 4.v.1980
CANCAP-II, Sta. 2.D10: Canary Islands, S coast of Hierro, W of Punta de los Saltos, Pt de Naos; 27°39'N 18°00'W; rocky bottom, depth 10-15 m; scuba diving; 3,10.ix.1977
CANCAP-I, Sta. 1.K08: S coast of Madeira, Funchal, W of harbour; 32°38'N 17°05'W; rocky shore with boulders; shore collecting; 24/25-II/19.iii.1976
Nederland, Noord Brabant, Kerkdriel, Lange Weistraat
